overview:
Abhishek is co-founder of Zumbl.com a young startup based in India which is a chatting portal for strangers. Abhishek is a machine learning enthusiast and a person who loves to talk.

Abhishek took a gap year from his Engineering course in Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi to work on his venture Zumbl.com.

Zumbl is an online chat portal which enables meaningful interactions & user engagement between people.

This is done through a revolutionary sentiment mining technology, that captures message intent and emotion… improving the most visually appealing aspect of all text communication, SMILEYS!

Zumbl associates tags, badges & animated avatars to its users to avoid profanity & pretentious behaviour in a way that no chat room has done before… creating a safe user community that is based on impressions from user-to-user.

The equation is simple (Meaning Interactions + User Engagement) - (Profanity + Pretentious Behaviour) = Zumbl
